title: Gunmen attack Syrian pro-government TV Channel, 3 killed
description: DAMASCUS， June 27 (Xinhua) -- A group of gunmen attacked the building of a Syrian pro-government TV channel early Wednesday， killing three staff members， local media reported.
cleanContent: DAMASCUS, June 27 (Xinhua) -- A group of gunmen attacked the building of a Syrian pro-government TV channel early Wednesday, killing three staff members, local media reported.The assailants ransacked the offices of the Al-Ikhbariya and planted explosives there, said the report.Three employees were killed in the "terrorist attack," it said. But there were no more immediate details on the assault.																																																																								|  |
